title: Heera Aur Panna Jhumki: A Timeless Blend of Heritage and Elegance
materials: Natural Emerald (Panna) drop. Featuring the renowned Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous shine.
features: This exquisite Jhumka showcases an oval-shaped Polki diamond surrounded by a halo of glittering brilliant cut diamonds. A vibrant, pear-shaped Emerald drop adds a touch of traditional South Indian charm. The intricate detailing around the stone settings reflects superior craftsmanship. The earring is designed for comfortable wear with a secure screw-back fastening.
colors: Primarily gold with a sparkling white from the diamonds and a rich green from the emerald
creating a striking contrast. The natural inclusions in the Polki diamond add a unique
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This Jhumka is a testament to timeless design and exquisite craftsmanship. The use of Polki diamonds, a traditional Indian gemstone, lends it a regal air, while the brilliant cut diamonds add contemporary sparkle. The vibrant emerald drop symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece.
